title.@value: Schizoaffective disorder, first episode, in full remission

definition.@value: All definitional requirements for Schizoaffective disorder, first episode in terms of symptoms and duration were previously met. Symptoms have ameliorated such that no significant symptoms remain. The remission may have occurred in response to medication or other treatment.

label.@value: Schizoaffective disorder, first episode, in full remission
